wikipedia_page.main: Steven Harold Conroy (19 December 1956 – 4 May 2021) was an English footballer who played as a goalkeeper who spent the bulk of his career playing for Sheffield United.

response: Stephen Conroy or Steve Conroy may refer to:

* 4 May 2021: Steve Conroy, 64, Sheffield United, Rotherham United and Rochdale goalkeeper.Sheffield United lead tributes as former Blades, Leeds and Rotherham United goalkeeper Steve Conroy passes away
*Steve Conroy, 64, English footballer (Sheffield United, Rotherham United, Rochdale).Sheffield United lead tributes as former Blades, Leeds and Rotherham United goalkeeper Steve Conroy passes away
